attributes.action: to rethink the new legislation after the abolition of the patient and public involvement forums
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: please can the goverment carefully review the abolition of the patient and public involvement forums. There are so many volunteers who have given their time and efforts to the patient and  the public. We have made huge progress with our work. Surely there must be a well organised transition stage ? There is very unclear information as to what involvement will be in place. There is a danger of collapse. We are expereienced intelligent individuals who have grown and built our  knowledge to help others
